page.title: 12Cold Norton Post Office.
page.content: In talking with Mrs Smith,who is in charge of the Post office,we found out that it is 35 years old and that she had been there for 20 of those years, having moved from London to Cold Norton.She also said that she enjoyed running the post office.Before 1950 the post office used to be situated a few yards away at what is now a private house. {What We Use the Post Office For.} or the most part we use the Post Office for sending letters and parcels or for buying stamps and Postal Orders.Older people in the village are able to claim their pensions at the Post Office once a week. The Post Office also operates as a shop and sells vasrious sweets and stationery items.
